trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for shape elements, such as <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Polygon"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> class.

Arranges a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> by evaluating its <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.RenderedGeometry"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stretch"></xref> properties.
If `finalsize` is an invalid value (a null reference or `empty`), nothing is drawn on the screen.
The final evaluated size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref>.
The final size of the arranged <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> element.
Gets a value that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that specifies how the shape's interior is painted.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, f <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that describes how the shape's interior is painted.
The default is `null`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill"></xref> dependency property.
This field is read-only.
Gets a value that represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref> that is applied to the geometry of a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> prior to when it is drawn.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref> that is applied to the geometry of a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> prior to when it is drawn.
Measures a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> during the first layout pass prior to arranging it.
A maximum <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to not exceed.
The maximum <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref>.
Provides a means to change the default appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> element.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object that is drawn during the rendering pass of this <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref>.
Gets a value that represents the final rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref>.
The final rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref>.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref> enumeration value that describes how the shape fills its allocated space.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref> enumeration values.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stretch"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that specifies how the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> outline is painted.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`

<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that specifies how the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> outline is painted.
The default is `null`.
Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.Double"></xref> values that indicate the pattern of dashes and gaps that is used to outline shapes.
Each <xref:System.Double> in the collection specifies the length of a dash or gap relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> of the pen.
For example, a value of `1` creates a dash or gap that has the same length as the thickness of the pen (a square).
The first item in the collection, which is located at index 0, specifies the length of a dash; the second item, which is located at index 1, specifies the length of a gap.
Objects with an even index value specify dashes; objects with an odd index value specify gaps.
A collection of <xref href="System.Double"></xref> values that specify the pattern of dashes and gaps.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeDashArray"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref> enumeration value that specifies how the ends of a dash are drawn.
This setting applies to both ends of each dash.
One of the enumeration values for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref>.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap.Flat"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeDashCap"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that specifies the distance within the dash pattern where a dash begins.
A <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represents the distance within the dash pattern where a dash begins.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeDashOffset"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref> enumeration value that describes the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> at the end of a line.
This property has no effect if you set it on a shape that has no <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A> or that has no start or end points.
For example, this property has no effect if you set it on an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>.
One of the enumeration values for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref>.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap.Flat"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeEndLineCap"></xref> dependency property.

Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineJoin"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the type of join that is used at the vertices of a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref>.
This property has no effect if you set it on an element that has no vertices, such as on a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Line> element.
One of the enumeration values for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineJoin"></xref>
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeLineJoin"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeThickness"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> element.
A miter forms a corner by beveling the ends of two joined lines.When two line segments meet at a sharp angle, the miter may extend beyond the thickness of the line that strokes the path.
The limit on the ratio of the miter length to the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeThickness"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> element.
This value is always a positive number that is greater than or equal to 1.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeMiterLimit"></xref> dependency property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke"></xref> dependency property.

Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref> enumeration value that describes the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> at the start of a <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke"></xref>.
This property has no effect if you set it on a shape that has no <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A> or that has no start or end points.
For example, this property has no effect if you set it on an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref> enumeration values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap.Flat"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeStartLineCap"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> outline.
The width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape"></xref> outline.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.StrokeThickness"></xref> dependency property.
